title: What Some People Apart Are Up To In 2016

property1.upto: Study and explore things on the periphery of design

property1.upto: Get back into the hustle and grind of client-facing design

property1.text: Liz Danzico, chair and cofounder of SVA MFA Interaction Design; creative director, NPR
property1.upto: For the next year, I’m practicing non-motion. No sudden shifts; no pivots; no renovations. Instead: continuity and flow.

property1.text: Brad Frost, web designer
Andrew Grimes, user experience consultant
property1.upto: Sites that match design with content, and vary layout as often as magazines do.
